subject: Cable Television
Baseball
lead_paragraph: SNY, the Mets-owned cable channel, is promoting its coverage of all New York-area pro teams in its nightly sports news show with advertisements that will be posted at the 161st Street subway station.
snippet: SNY, the Mets-owned cable channel, is promoting its coverage of all New York-area pro teams in its nightly sports news show with advertisements that will be posted at the 161st Street subway station.
